thread.title: A Lovely Boutique Hotel In Midtown Manhattan - Review
thread.title_full: A Lovely Boutique Hotel In Midtown Manhattan - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JourneyJen
title: A Lovely Boutique Hotel In Midtown Manhattan - Review
text:
On a recent trip to New York, I stayed at the Iroquois, a small, independent hotel in midtown. It is a few blocks east of Times Square and the Theater District and a short walk from the shops of Fifth Avenue. Its rooms are comfortable, clean and well-kept. The staff that I encountered while staying there – from housekeeping to bell staff and front desk – were all friendly, efficient and welcoming. The hotel’s location is a short walk to many tourist attractions. However, it is far enough away that it is rather quiet, a welcome break from the noise and bustle of the City.
On the whole, I enjoyed my stay at the Iroquois. I certainly will consider it for future visits to New York.
